```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

require(ggplot2)
require(dplyr)
library(readr)

```


```{r}
transcription_text <- read_csv("~/Desktop/telephone-project/shiny-app/transcription-text.csv")
lengths(gregexpr("\\W+", transcription_text)) + 1

transcription_text <- transcription_text %>%
  mutate(count = lengths(gregexpr("\\W+", transcriptions)) + 1) %>%
  cbind(iteration = 1:6)

transcription_text %>%
ggplot(aes(x = iteration, y  = count )) +geom_point()

```
